metadata.title: CVE-2022-3654 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Layout in Google Chrome prior to 107.0.5304.62 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
